Q_DESC:
Chef has a number D containing only digits 0's and 1's. 

He wants to make the number to have all the digits same. 

For that, he will change exactly one digit, i.e. from 0 to 1 or from 1 to 0. If it is possible to make all digits equal (either all 0's or all 1's) by flipping exactly 1 digit then output Yes, else print No (quotes for clarity)

Input Format:

The first line will contain an integer T representing the number of test cases.
Each test case contain a number made of only digits 1's and 0's on newline

Output Format:

Print yes or no based on the above specified condition.
